en.title: **Frontend Developer**
en.text:
• Developed and maintained 5+ responsive user interfaces using React and Next.js, improving user retention by 15% through improved UI/UX.
  • Integrated RESTful and GraphQL APIs, reducing frontend loading times by 40% and improving data retrieval speed by 30%.
  • Collaborated with the design team to implement UI/UX improvements that led to a 20% increase in user engagement.
  • Played a key role in ensuring cross-browser compatibility, achieving 100% compatibility across 5 major browsers.

en.title: **Blockchain Engineer**
en.text:
• Designed and deployed 10+ smart contracts on the Ethereum network, implementing DeFi protocols that processed over $5M+ in transactions within the first quarter of launch.
  • Integrated blockchain functionalities with traditional backend services, utilizing Node.js and GraphQL to create secure, scalable applications with a 99.9% uptime.
  • Conducted smart contract performance optimizations that reduced transaction times by 50% and minimized gas fees by 25%, leading to a 20% increase in transaction volume.
  • Worked closely with front-end teams to enable smooth wallet integrations (MetaMask, Web3), supporting 500+ daily active users in a secure environment.

en.title: **Senior Full Stack Engineer**
en.text:
• Led the development of 5+ decentralized applications (dApps), leveraging blockchain technology and smart contracts in the Ethereum and Rust ecosystems, resulting in a 30% increase in user adoption within 6 months.
  • Architected and deployed end-to-end solutions (frontend UI to backend APIs and blockchain interactions) for 3 major client projects, improving overall system performance by 40% and reducing backend API response times by 25%.
  • Optimized smart contracts, reducing gas costs by up to 35%, ensuring efficient transactions for over 1,000+ daily users.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams (frontend, backend, security) to ensure scalable, secure, and high-performance blockchain solutions, with zero downtime during product launches.
  • Mentored 4 junior developers, providing code reviews and fostering a culture of collaboration and best practices.
